alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 12:14PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLANDS...EASTERN CHARLOTTE...SOUTHEASTERN DESOTO AND LEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EST... At 1213 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cape Coral, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, and Lovers Key State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
